  • Method Details

    • getViableDirections

      public HashMap<Character, ArrayList<DirectionEnum>> getViableDirections()
      Accessor for the viableDirections HashMap.
      Returns:
      mapping of each player to their list of viable movement directions

    • getPieceCounts

      public HashMap<Character, Integer> getPieceCounts()
      Accessor for the pieceCount HashMap.
      Returns:
      mapping of each player to number of pieces remaining

    • placePiece

      public void placePiece(BoardPosition pos, char player)
      Places a player’s piece at the specified board position.
      Parameters:
      pos - BoardPosition to place the piece
      player - character representing the player ('x', 'o', etc.)

    • whatsAtPos

      public char whatsAtPos(BoardPosition pos)
      Returns the character at a given board position.
      Parameters:
      pos - the BoardPosition to check
      Returns:
      character at that position ('x', 'o', '*', ' ', etc.)

    • checkPlayerWin

      public boolean checkPlayerWin(Character player)
      Determines if the specified player has won the game.
      Parameters:
      player - character representing the player
      Returns:
      true if only that player has pieces remaining

    • crownPiece

      public void crownPiece(BoardPosition posOfPlayer)
      Crowns a piece by converting it to uppercase at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      posOfPlayer - position of the piece to crown

    • movePiece

      public BoardPosition movePiece(BoardPosition startingPos, DirectionEnum dir)
      Moves a piece one tile in the specified direction.
      Parameters:
      startingPos - starting position of the piece
      dir - direction to move
      Returns:
      new BoardPosition after move

    • jumpPiece

      public BoardPosition jumpPiece(BoardPosition startingPos, DirectionEnum dir)
      Moves a piece by jumping over an opponent's piece.
      Parameters:
      startingPos - starting position of the piece
      dir - direction to jump
      Returns:
      new BoardPosition after jump

    • scanSurroundingPositions

      public HashMap<DirectionEnum, Character> scanSurroundingPositions(BoardPosition startingPos)
      Scans the surrounding positions and maps each direction to the character at that adjacent position.
      Parameters:
      startingPos - center position to scan from
      Returns:
      HashMap of DirectionEnum to character at adjacent positions

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a formatted string representing the board layout.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      the 8x8 board in string format with headers for rows and columns
